about us

Welcome to JNV Betul Alumni Association. We aim to provide a lifelong connection between the alumni and students of JNV Betul. It is a platform for interaction and expression for the various members of JNV Betul. JNV Betul is situated near a small village called Prabhat Pattan in the Betul district of Madhya Pradesh. Prabhat Pattan, though a small village is known for its freedom fighters. Like all other JNVs across India, JNV Prabhat Pattan has been more than a school and home for many students, majority from the rural areas of Betul district since its inception in 1993. It has shaped the careers of many students who are at many important places in both government and private sectors now. In collaboration with extremely dedicated volunteers, we seek to connect alumni, support students and build an unforgettable experience through diverse events, programs and service.

history

On 25th December 2016 Alumni day was held at JNV Betul and on that occasion it was felt that there should be a well organized alumni association for the school which should work towards development of school and students. Starting with this in mind a preliminary visit to school and meeting with school management was done on 29th January 2017 and it was decided to form JNV Betul Alumni Association. An Alumni Body was already existing which was formed by the first batch of the school, adding to it only, officially JNV Betul Alumni Association was formed on 21 May 2017 in concurrence with our school foundation day i.e. 21 may 1993.

objectives

  • To bring all the alumni and students of JNV Betul on a single platform.
  • Create a network to enable the alumni to remain connected with their Alma mater and provide career guidance to help them shape their future
  • Provide financial assistance to indigent students through different scholarship schemes of Government of India
  • Inform them about various loans provided by different banks and taking the help of various NGOs
  • Organize various activities in school with the help of teachers and students to keep them informed, develop skills to excel in the outside world after JNV
  • Provide thorough career guidance to students with the help of various alumni who are excelling in various fields
  • Actively manage funds to improve infrastructure and facilities in school towards the development of students
  • To invoke values of "come to learn, go out to serve" as the motto of JNV says among the students
  • Help the JNVBAA members in times of need through our wide network of alumni

functioning

There are three teams which are working - "Maargdarshak dal","Kaaryasadhak dal", and "Samanvayak dal"

Maargdarshak Dal

It is a team of all alumni of the batch 2008 and above, they are super seniors, and they are there to provide all necessary guidance, help and instructions.

Kaaryasadhak Dal

It is a team of all alumni of batches 2009-2016, this group works at ground level comprising information , organizing events, and all necessary things which are to be done.

Samanvayak Dal

It is a team of 12 students from 9th and 11th class, their job is to be in touch with the Kaaryasadhak dal and implement the actions advised by them in school and give feedbacks.

  • Further batches passing out will be subsequently added to the Kaaryasadhak Dal.
  • A separate group namely JNV BETUL Alumni coordinators is made which comprises of representatives of all batches, this group will discuss over major things, take advice from other batch mates separately and communicate messages to all.

Expectation from Students

All students currently studying in JNV and those who are recently passed out are main beneficiaries of the activities.

  • Students are expected to show curiosity, eagerness and ready to work attitude.
  • Students are expected to keep constant communication with seniors, take instructions from them and implement them.
  • In future they are expected to take over the activities of alumni association and put their all efforts and dedication towards our aim.
